item.title: Netflix's Chronicles Of Narnia Movies Might Get Unprecedented Theatrical Release By Streamer After Renewed Pressure From Greta Gerwig & Margot Robbie Deal Failure
item.description: Netflix may be on course to shake up its movie distribution methods due to several factors surrounding Greta Gerwig's Chronicles of Narnia adaptation.

item.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean Narrowly Missed Out On A Married Hollywood Couple Appearing Together Onscreen
item.description: A Hollywood couple can claim the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise for their resumes, but they never actually appeared on screen together.

item.title: Netflix's New Time Travel Horror Movie Makes Back To The Future's Biggest Plot Hole Even Worse After 39 Years
item.description: Back to the Future's original ending has a major plot hole, and Netflix's new time travel movie has now made the narrative inconsistency even worse.
